short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly export Etsy ad spend reports and calculate profits on product sales.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock Your Etsy Business Potential with ProfitTree!

ProfitTree is the ultimate tool for Etsy sellers who want to optimize their business performance. With two powerful features designed to streamline your workflow and boost your profits, ProfitTree helps you make data-driven decisions with ease.

Key Features:
- Ad Spend Exporter: Tired of manually compiling your Etsy ad spend data? ProfitTree’s Ad Spend Exporter lets you effortlessly export detailed ad spend reports directly from Etsy in just a few clicks. Save time, avoid errors, and get a clear view of your advertising investments.
- Price Calculator: Are you charging the right amount for your products? The Price Calculator feature helps you analyze your current pricing strategy to determine its impact on your profit margins. Get instant feedback on how price adjustments could increase your profitability.

Why Choose ProfitTree?
- User-Friendly: Simple, intuitive interface designed for Etsy sellers of all experience levels.
- Time-Saving: Automate tedious tasks so you can focus on growing your business.
- Data-Driven Insights: Make informed decisions based on accurate, up-to-date information.
- Enhanced Profitability: Maximize your earnings by optimizing your ad spend and pricing strategies.

Who Should Use ProfitTree?
ProfitTree is perfect for Etsy sellers, whether you’re just starting out or a seasoned pro. If you’re looking to take control of your financial data and make smart decisions that grow your business, ProfitTree is the tool you need.

Get Started Today!
Install ProfitTree now and start making your Etsy business more profitable and efficient.

Installation Instructions:
- Click the "Add to Chrome" button.
- Confirm the installation by clicking "Add Extension."
- Access ProfitTree from the Chrome toolbar.
- Make sure you are logged in to Etsy in at least one tab.
- Start exporting your Etsy ad spend data or calculating your product pricing immediately!

Support and Contact Information:
If you need assistance or have any questions, please contact us at support@profittree.io.
Our team is here to help you make the most out of ProfitTree!
